product_name: Current Designs Solstice GT Fiberglass Kayak With Rudder
long_description: This classic kayak design has outstanding acceleration, glide, and tracking so you can cover some serious distance in a hurry. Generous storage hatches provide ample room for longer excursions.
short_description: This classic kayak design has outstanding acceleration, glide, and tracking so you can cover some serious distance in a hurry. Generous storage hatches provide ample room for longer excursions.
